EmailTemplate.description: Help us invest in your MathWorks training success
EmailTemplate.name: Enrollment Training Survey - English
EmailTemplate.subject: Your MathWorks Training Evaluation
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Enrollment__c.Enrollee_Name__c} ,
Thank you for attending training from the MathWorks. Our goal is to ensure your success using MATLAB, Simulink, and associated tools for your applications.
We are dedicated to continuously improving your learning experience, and your feedback is important to us. Kindly take a moment to complete our post training survey, which should only take about five (5) minutes of your time.
Post Training Survey
Thank you in advance for your time investment, and we look forward to meeting your learning needs in the future.
Sincerely,
Craig Santos Training Business Manager The MathWorks, Inc. Craig.Santos@mathworks.com
To update your address, send e-mail to: service@mathworks.com
Â© 2014 The MathWorks, Inc. MATLAB and Simulink are registered trademarks of The MathWorks, Inc. See mathworks.com/trademarks for a list of additional trademarks. Other product or brand names may be trademarks or registered trademarks of their respective holders.
OPT-OUT: Click on the link to remove this e-mail address from the MathWorks commercial electronic mailing list.
